abstract: U.S. consumer confidence takes a dive amid coronavirus
Stoxx Europe 600 Index closed at its highest in seven weeks

361604479.title: Asia Stocks Trade Mixed After U.S. Rally; Oil Down: Markets Wrap

361605843.title: S&P 500's earnings per share estimate has tumbled as the pandemic spread

361620237.title: Manhattan As Cuomo Orders 75% Of New Yorkers To Stay Home From Work

361620241.title: Manhattan As Cuomo Orders 75% Of New Yorkers To Stay Home From Work

body: The biggest U.S. technology shares slumped, weighing on major equity gauges as consumer confidence crashed and more companies withdrew earnings guidance. The dollar weakened.
